Title: Oracle data source Error in command_ Could not load file or assembly Oracle.DataAccess _ Community
Author: Christian Hauggaard
Text: Testing the connection to a new Oracle data source causes the Oracle data source window to close and one of the followingerror messages to appear  Could not load file or assembly 'Oracle.DataAccess, Version 4.112.2.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=<Public Key>'. This assembly was compiled for a different processor. Missing or incorrectly installed Oracle Data Provider here when performing the install, and remember to restart after the installation is complete
